name: Klaus Dantas Wagner
aboutText: My first Website built with Adobe Dreamweaver in 2009 for my former church. During my studies in print and media technology at Beuth University, 5 semesters (not completed), I gained a deeper understanding of the web world. This led to the opportunity to work with esf-print, including their online designer and Magento shop. In March 2020, I started my Bootcamp as a full-stack developer and have since been continuously learning and deepening my skills in the JS world, specifically with Next.js, React, Unit, and end-to-end testing.

work.title: Frontend developer
work.description:
1) Umwandlung sowie Ablösung der Website von C# in React, Next.js 
 2) SEO Performance - Code Splitting, Analyse von Chunks(Webpack), Reduzierung von CLS, FCP, LCP, Blocking Time adfadsf 
 3) Multi-Mandanten: Ein Repository, ein Projekt für mehreren gleichzeitig Mandanten
work.techstack:
React, Next.js, TypeScript, 
 Unit Test - Jest / E2E Test - Puppeteer, 
 Docker - Swarm GitLab / Vercel / CI - CD 
 GraphQL / CMS
